// --- END CODE INDEX META ---
using LagoVista.AI.Models;
using LagoVista.Core.Models.UIMetaData;
using LagoVista.Core.Validation;
using LagoVista.IoT.Logging.Loggers;
using LagoVista.IoT.Web.Common.Attributes;
using LagoVista.IoT.Web.Common.Controllers;
using LagoVista.UserAdmin.Models.Users;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc;
using Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Linq;
using System.Threading.Tasks;

namespace LagoVista.AI.Rest
{
    /// <summary>
    /// REST Class for Experiments
    /// </summary>
    [ConfirmedUser]
    [AppBuilder]
    public class VectorDatabaseController : LagoVistaBaseController
    {
        private readonly IAgentContextTestManager _agentContextTestManager;

        public VectorDatabaseController(IAgentContextTestManager AgentContextTestMgr, UserManager<AppUser> userManager, IAdminLogger logger) : base(userManager, logger)
        {
            this._agentContextTestManager = AgentContextTestMgr;
        }


        [HttpGet("/api/ai/agentContextTest/{id}")]
        public async Task<DetailResponse<AgentContextTest>> GetVectorDatabase(string id)
        {
            var db = await _agentContextTestManager.GetAgentContextTestAsync(id, OrgEntityHeader, UserEntityHeader);
            return DetailResponse<AgentContextTest>.Create(db);
        }

        [HttpGet("/api/ai/agentContextTest/factory")]
        public DetailResponse<AgentContextTest> CreateAgentContextTest()
        {
            var result = DetailResponse<AgentContextTest>.Create();
            SetAuditProperties(result.Model);
            SetOwnedProperties(result.Model);
            return result;
        }


        [HttpGet("/api/ai/agentContextTest/{id}/secrets")]
        public async Task<DetailResponse<AgentContextTest>> GetVectorDatabaseWithSecrets(string id)
        {
            var db = await _agentContextTestManager.GetAgentContextTestWithSecretsAsync(id, OrgEntityHeader, UserEntityHeader);
            return DetailResponse<AgentContextTest>.Create(db);
        }

        [HttpGet("/api/ai/agentContextTests")]
        public Task<ListResponse<AgentContextTestSummary>> GetVectorDatabases()
        {
            return _agentContextTestManager.GetAgentContextTestsForOrgAsync(OrgEntityHeader, UserEntityHeader, GetListRequestFromHeader());
        }

        [HttpDelete("/api/ai/agentContextTest/{id}")]
        public Task<InvokeResult> DeleteAgentContextTestAsync(string id)
        {
            return _agentContextTestManager.DeleteAgentContextTestAsync(id, OrgEntityHeader, UserEntityHeader);
        }

        [HttpPost("/api/ai/agentContextTest")]
        public Task<InvokeResult> AddAgentContextTest([FromBody] AgentContextTest ctx)
        {
            return _agentContextTestManager.AddAgentContextTestAsync(ctx, OrgEntityHeader, UserEntityHeader);
        }

        [HttpPut("/api/ai/agentContextTest")]
        public Task<InvokeResult> UpdateAgentContextTest([FromBody] AgentContextTest ctx)
        {
            SetUpdatedProperties(ctx);
            return _agentContextTestManager.UpdateAgentContextTestAsync(ctx, OrgEntityHeader, UserEntityHeader);
        }

        [HttpGet("/api/ai/agent/conversation/ContextTest/factory")]
        public DetailResponse<ConversationContextTest> CreateConversationContextTest()
        {
            var result = DetailResponse<ConversationContextTest>.Create();
            return result;
        }
    }
}
